sys_ux_client_script.name: Open CTI

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_8c47f5d32ffc15108e343e0ef699b6d6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">8cf63d932ffc15108e343e0ef699b6f9</macroponent><name>Open CTI</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    let number = "",
        table = "",
        sysId = "",
        source = "";
    if (event.name == "SN_FORM_DATA_CONNECTED#OPEN_PHONE") {
        number = event.payload.number;
        table = event.payload.table;
        sysId = event.payload.sysid;
        source = "ribbon" + "~" +new Date().getTime();
    } else if (event.name == "RECORD#OPEN_CALL") {
        number = event.payload.params.number;
        table = event.payload.params.table;
        sysId = event.payload.params.sysId;
        source = event.payload.params.source + "~" + new Date().getTime();
    }
    api.emit('VIEWPORT_SELECTED', {
        id: 'cti',
        group: "bottom",
        viewportInfo: {
            route: 'cti',
            fields: {
                opened: true
            },
            params: {
                number,
                table,
                sysId,
                source
            },
            viewportElementId: 'wsOpenframeCTI'
        }
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-25 09:42:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c47f5d32ffc15108e343e0ef699b6d6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open CTI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_8c47f5d32ffc15108e343e0ef699b6d6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-25 09:42:35</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
